input.system_prompt:
You are an AI assistant evaluating product relevancy.
Your goal is to determine how relevant a list of competitor products are to a specific reference product, based on names and descriptions.
Output the scores as a JSON object containing a single key 'scores', which is an array of objects. Each object in the array must have 'competitor_product_name' (the exact competitor product name provided in the input), 'relevancy_score' (an integer 1-10), and 'rationale' (a brief explanation for the score).

The relevancy scale is 1-10:
- 1: Not relevant at all.
- 10: Identical product.

Important scoring guidelines:
- Focus on product function, features, silhouette, and construction
- DO NOT emphasize color or pattern when scoring, as the reference product may encompass a wide range of colors/patterns not specified
- Consider the core product type, shape, materials, and intended use
- Evaluate if the products serve similar purposes and would appeal to similar customers
- Ensure every competitor product listed receives a score.
input.user_prompt:
Reference Brand: "Taylor Stitch"
Reference Product Name: "The Democratic Chino"
Reference Product Description:
Originally issued to American soldiers during WWII, the first military chinos were celebrated for their comfort, versatility, and impressive ruggedness. They proved so popular, in fact, that soldiers held onto their well-worn pairs even after discharge, and as more and more civilians took notice, the style became a fixture of garages and workshops as well as college campuses and city streets all across the country. Featuring 100% Responsible materials and an updated silhouette, The Foundation Pant is both a reinvention of our earlier chinos and an elevated reimagining of the all-purpose originals, built to help you start your day on solid ground. Because it's been garment dyed and washed, it has the character of a well-loved vintage piece, and it'll continue to pick up a ton of nuance with wear. Cool herringbone accents at the waistband and the pockets serve as a nod to the style's military origins. SPECIFICATIONS Classic medium rise, tailored fit, straight through the thigh with a slight taper from knee to leg opening. Available in 32" inseam. 8-oz. 100% organic cotton. 5-oz. 100% organic cotton herringbone pocketing. Garment dyed and washed for a vintage feel. Front slash pockets allow easy entry into pockets. Low-profile welt coin pocket inset at waistband. Two back welt pockets. 4-hole vintage military style button at waistband. YKK zipper fly. Bound fly and outseam. Wash cold and tumble dry low. Made in China. Model is 6'1", wearing a 32.

Competitor Products to Evaluate (Max 25):
  - Name='Dockers Athletic Fit Men's Ultimate Chino Pants with Smart 360 Flex'
  - Name='Dockers Signature Khaki Straight Fit Pants Comfort Waistband 594090008'
  - Name='Ultimate Chinos, Slim Fit Dockers, Mens 32x30'
  - Name='$62 Dockers Men Brown Classic-fit Flat-front Khaki Stretch Pants Size'
  - Name='Dockers Men's Slim-fit Comfort Knit Chino Pants - Khaki 33x32'
  - Name='Dockers Men's Essential Chino Straight Fit Pants - Stretch - Welt'
  - Name='Dockers Easy Khaki Classic Fit Pleated Pants Men's'
  - Name='Mens Dockers Ultimate Chino Slim Fit Pants Smart 360 Flex 38x29 Navy'
  - Name='Dockers Men's Khaki Classic Cotton 5 Pocket Straight Fit Pants 38 Tedo'
  - Name='Men's Dockers Easy Khaki W Stretch Slim Fit 362950006 Black Many Sizes'
  - Name='Dockers Mens D3 Classic Fit Soft Khaki Fkat Front Chino Pants Light'
  - Name='Dockers Smart 360 Comfort Knit Chino Pant Men 36x34 Blue Performance'
  - Name='Pantalones Cortos Para Hombre Faherty Con Bucle De Cintur√≥n Todo El'
  - Name='Marine Layer Breeze Saturday Chino'
  - Name='Marine Layer Men's 5 Pocket Twill Pant'
  - Name='Marine Layer Relaxed Fit Breyer Utility Pants'
  - Name='Marine Layer Men's Saturday Slim Straight Twill Pant | Small | Washed Black | Chino | Mid Rise | Machine Washable | Vietnam'
  - Name='Marine Layer Men's Saturday Beach Regular Fit Pants in Sand | XL | Beige | 32 in'
  - Name='Marine Layer Breeze Saturday Chino Pants India Ink'
  - Name='Men's Marine Layer Athletic Fit Saturday Chino'
  - Name='Marine Layer Saturday Moleskin Chino'
  - Name='Marine Layer Men's Saturday Slim Straight Twill Pants'
  - Name='Marine Layer Pants Mens Small Saturday Jogger Chino Slim Fit Light'
  - Name='Marine Layer Saturday Athletic Fit Pants'
  - Name='Marine Layer Optimist Pant Shiitake Mens Corduroy Size M'

Based on the reference product description and each competitor product's name, please provide the relevancy score for *each* competitor product using the 1-10 scale. Remember to focus on product features, silhouette, and construction rather than color or pattern. Return the results in the specified JSON format (an object with a 'scores' array, where each item has 'competitor_product_name', 'relevancy_score', and 'rationale' explaining why you assigned that score).

scores.description: An array of relevancy scores for the competitor products.

competitor_product_name.description: The exact name of the competitor product as provided in the input.

rationale.description: Brief explanation for why this score was assigned.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Dockers Athletic Fit Men's Ultimate Chino Pants with Smart 360 Flex
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Both are men's chinos with a focus on comfort and fit; although Dockers emphasizes athletic fit and stretch, the core product type matches well with the tailored, tapered chinos from Taylor Stitch.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Dockers Signature Khaki Straight Fit Pants Comfort Waistband 594090008
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Straight fit chinos with comfort waistband align closely with Taylor Stitch's tailored, straight-through thigh and tapered chinos, though the waistband feature differs.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Ultimate Chinos, Slim Fit Dockers, Mens 32x30
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Slim fit chinos similar in construction and silhouette (slim/tailored tapered fit) closely parallel the reference product's style and function.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: $62 Dockers Men Brown Classic-fit Flat-front Khaki Stretch Pants Size
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Classic fit chino-style pants with stretch share many characteristics, but the looser fit differentiates them somewhat from the tailored reference chinos.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Dockers Men's Slim-fit Comfort Knit Chino Pants - Khaki 33x32
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Slim-fit chinos with knit fabric and comfort features align well with the reference chinos' fit and focus on wearability, though knit fabric differs from 100% organic cotton.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Dockers Men's Essential Chino Straight Fit Pants - Stretch - Welt
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Straight fit stretch chinos with welt details are quite similar in silhouette and construction, designed as versatile chino pants.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Dockers Easy Khaki Classic Fit Pleated Pants Men's
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Classic fit pleated pants differ in fit and styling (pleats) compared to the tailored, flat-front reference chinos, making them moderately relevant.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Mens Dockers Ultimate Chino Slim Fit Pants Smart 360 Flex 38x29 Navy
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Slim fit flex chinos correspond closely to the reference chinos' tailored tapered silhouette and feature set.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Dockers Men's Khaki Classic Cotton 5 Pocket Straight Fit Pants 38 Tedo
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Classic cotton straight fit chinos with 5 pockets align broadly in category but have a straighter fit rather than tapered and less tailored appearance.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Men's Dockers Easy Khaki W Stretch Slim Fit 362950006 Black Many Sizes
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Slim fit stretchy chinos designed for comfort are highly relevant for their similar silhouette and function to the reference.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Dockers Mens D3 Classic Fit Soft Khaki Fkat Front Chino Pants Light
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Classic fit with soft fabric suggests a looser, less tailored silhouette differing somewhat from the reference chinos' straight and tapered fit.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Dockers Smart 360 Comfort Knit Chino Pant Men 36x34 Blue Performance
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Comfort knit chinos with smart 360 stretch share the chino pant category and focus on versatility, but knit construction differs from woven cotton chino fabric.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Pantalones Cortos Para Hombre Faherty Con Bucle De Cintur√≥n Todo El
scores_with_rationales.rationale: These are shorts, not pants, so they are not relevant to the reference chino pants despite possibly similar styling.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Marine Layer Breeze Saturday Chino
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Men's chinos with a casual, comfortable focus like the reference are quite relevant in function and type, though details on fit are less specific.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Marine Layer Men's 5 Pocket Twill Pant
scores_with_rationales.rationale: 5-pocket twill pants are similar in material and casual pant category but may differ in construction and tailored fit specifics.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Marine Layer Relaxed Fit Breyer Utility Pants
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Relaxed fit utility pants differ from the tailored and slightly tapered chinos in silhouette and intended style/purpose.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Marine Layer Men's Saturday Slim Straight Twill Pant | Small | Washed Black | Chino | Mid Rise | Machine Washable | Vietnam
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Slim straight chino pants closely match the reference in silhouette, rise, and fabric category.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Marine Layer Men's Saturday Beach Regular Fit Pants in Sand | XL | Beige | 32 in
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Regular fit beach pants are looser and more casual than the tailored chinos and likely have different fabric weight and construction.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Marine Layer Breeze Saturday Chino Pants India Ink
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Similar chino pant design emphasizing comfort and casual wear, close in product type though material and finish details may differ.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Men's Marine Layer Athletic Fit Saturday Chino
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Athletic fit chinos share the chino pant category and similar performance/style goals with the reference, though fit is likely less tailored.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Marine Layer Saturday Moleskin Chino
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Moleskin fabric chinos share the chino silhouette and style but the fabric type differs from the organic cotton twill of the reference product.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Marine Layer Men's Saturday Slim Straight Twill Pants
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Slim straight twill pants are high in similarity for fit, fabric, and function to the reference chinos.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Marine Layer Pants Mens Small Saturday Jogger Chino Slim Fit Light
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Jogger chinos incorporate a different silhouette with ankle cuffs and casual style, differing from the classic tapered chinos.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Marine Layer Saturday Athletic Fit Pants
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Athletic fit chinos share fabric and general style but differ in fit from the tailored tapered reference pants.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Marine Layer Optimist Pant Shiitake Mens Corduroy Size M
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Corduroy pants differ significantly in fabric and typically in construction and use compared to classic organic cotton chinos.
